pages.title: Chinese Softshell Turtle
pages.text: Chinese soft-shell turtles were the first turtle species to undergo a large-scale outbreak of bacterial softshell disease, resulting in slower growth and increased fatality.$(br2)This lead not only to a decline in P. sinensis, but caused severe economic losses to the turtle culture industry.

pages.title: Chinese Softshell Turtle
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)2 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cod$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
